text: vela cunaha `aleykum fima `arradtum bihi min hitbeti-nnisai ev eknentum fi enfusikum. `alime-llahu ennekum setezkurunehunne velakil la tuva`iduhunne sirran illa en tekulu kavlem ma`rufa. vela ta`zimu `ukdete-nnikahi hatta yebluga-lkitabu eceleh. va`lemu enne-llahe ya`lemu ma fi enfusikum fahzeruh. va`lemu enne-llahe gafurun halim
